answers.answer: Drink a lot of water, go for a little walk and take it easy. If your face suddenly swells up, you could have preeclampsia and need to have your obgyn do some tests. If its just swollen feet, totally normal during pregnancy. Especially as the temperature rises. In order to avoid further swelling,  again, lots of water and regular excerise.
Try to put your feet up when you sit. this helps too.
I had the same thing. Ended up being gallstones. When in doubt, check with your doctor.

question: Hey everyone!!! My lower back & lower abdomen have been hurting for the past 2-3 days now & my feet are swollen up like little party sausage weenies. What do I do??? Tylenol does not help whatsoever!!! Yikes!!!
title: Achy Hopefully Not Breaky
